verses.name: Ezekiel 18:1
verses.text: The word of the Lord came unto me again, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:2
verses.text: What mean ye, that ye use this proverb concerning the land of Israel, saying, The fathers have eaten sour grapes, and the children’s teeth are set on edge?

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:3
verses.text: As I live, saith the Lord God, ye shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in Israel.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:4
verses.text: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul that sinneth, it shall die.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:5
verses.text: But if a man be just, and do that which is lawful and right,
